DanceDuration
@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.t50AQQwenusLr5aU]{Angel Dance}Until the start of your next turn

Choose one option: you gain Resistance to light damage; or all damage dealt by your attacks and spells becomes light.

DanceDuration
@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.QCTlpwSI35ypWKKS]{Banshee Dance}Instantaneous

Choose another creature that is able to see you. If that creature is already slow, they immediately suffer shaken.

DanceDuration
@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.71Cr58HNhFHtzTqN]{Bat Dance}Until the start of your next turn

Choose one option: you gain Resistance to dark damage; or all damage dealt by your attacks and spells becomes dark.

DanceDuration
@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.YN5ZFhKRnqq381I7]{Golem Dance}Until the start of your next turn

Choose one option: you gain Resistance to bolt damage; or all damage dealt by your attacks and spells becomes bolt.

DanceDuration
@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.4y9aruoDa2NqwoUw]{Griffin Dance}Until the start of your next turn

Choose one option: you gain Resistance to air damage; or all damage dealt by your attacks and spells becomes air

DanceDuration
@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.tu1dSPyWiUl8DMUY]{Hydra Dance}Until the start of your next turn

After you suffer damage, choose one option: you recover 5 Hit Points, or you recover 5 Mind Points.

Dance

Duration

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.RP1PRbMysmTnwfEa]{Kraken Dance}

Instantaneous

Choose another creature that is able to see you. If that creature is already dazed, they immediately suffer slow.

Dance

Duration

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.mTvy0jppcCEcmpQN]{Lion Dance}

Instantaneous

You immediately recover from a single status effect of your choice.

Dance

Duration

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.1lCRqkPoxPGnUBHQ]{Maenad Dance}

Instantaneous

Choose another creature that is able to see you. That creature loses an amount of Mind Points equal to your current Dexterity die size.

Dance

Duration

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.MBflOYsNp0Grh2zI]{Myrmidon Dance}

Until the start of your next turn

Choose one option: you gain Resistance to earth damage; or all damage dealt by your attacks and spells becomes earth.

Dance

Duration

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.1osIu05OTOlvhvIL]{Nightmare Dance}

Instantaneous

Choose another creature that is able to see you. If that creature is already shaken, they immediately suffer weak.

Dance

Duration

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.3xoV4kXCe24RKCRN]{Ouroboros Dance}

Instantaneous

Choose one ally you can see who has yet to take a turn during this round. That ally may take their turn immediately after yours during this round.

Dance

Duration

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.kViouDnYEiLZsuKj]{Peacock Dance}

Instantaneous

Choose another creature that is able to see you. The next time that creature performs an attack or casts an offensive ( @ICON[offensive] ) spell during this scene, that attack or spell must include you among its targets if possible.

Dance

Duration

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.WfbGw3bzCvbsOBzB]{Phoenix Dance}

Until the start of your next turn

Choose one option: you gain Resistance to fire damage; or all damage dealt by your attacks and spells becomes fire.

Dance

Duration

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.PIPfmBR92C4UjsW5]{Satyr Dance}

Instantaneous

Choose another creature that is able to see you. If that creature is already weak, they immediately suffer dazed.

Dance

Duration

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.4WuCxVpwfqDLPx02]{Unicorn Dance}

Instantaneous

Choose an ally that is able to see you and has a Bond towards you: you and that ally both recover an amount of Hit Points equal to your current Dexterity die size.
The restored amount increases by 5 Hit Points if you are level 20 or higher, or by 10 Hit Points if you are level 40 or higher.

Dance

Duration

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.I0L1IgalIrT2OMAh]{Yeti Dance}

Until the start of your next turn

Choose one option: you gain Resistance to ice damage; or all damage dealt by your attacks and spells becomes ice.
